actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to allow the heads of Executive agencies to pay to certain individuals amounts equal to 10 percent of the amounts saved by the detection and reporting by such individuals of waste or fraud in such agencies.
short_title: Government Waste and Fraud Informers Act of 1979

summary.text: Government Waste and Fraud Informers Act of 1979 - Authorizes Federal agency heads to pay any individual, who is not a Federal employee of the agency on the date the reported waste or fraud occurred, reporting waste or fraud in a Federal agency ten percent of the amount saved because of such report.

titles.title: Government Waste and Fraud Informers Act of 1979

A bill to allow the heads of Executive agencies to pay to certain individuals amounts equal to 10 percent of the amounts saved by the detection and reporting by such individuals of waste or fraud in such agencies.
